name: The Last day (itch) ({DevLab})
description:
The last day is a space shooter made over the week end for  a jam. 

I decide to combine different technics to make  a great short  gameplay experience  with : cinematic, tutorial,  a  side scroller space shooter challenge to pilot the ship with only one hand, and a leaderboard system working online. 

With the keyboard, piloting  the ship  with one hand is very difficult ,  I advice you  to use a gamepad  with left stick to move and left shoulder key to shoot.  ( use only one hand, no cheating). 

Story : Apocalypse , end of the world storyline. 

Now , i need to rest :)  lol glad to play your game soon.
